CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 21, 1968, pg. 10, reads: "Ethel Waters, the one and only, was in Pittsburgh last week with Billy Graham and his Crusade. Miss Waters was a soloist with his choir, and gave the many thousand of listeners, almost forgotten thrills.  She looks well, sounds good, and added to the Crusade. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ethel Waters on platform stairs at Pitt Stadium, for Billy Graham Crusade program, University of Pittsburgh, Oakland
